footnote-forum.message: For transparency, we add all Acceptable Ads to our forum so that our community of users can provide feedback.

footnote-keep-free.message: We are able to keep our open source product free by charging large entities a fee for whitelisting services. For the other roughly 90 percent of our partners, these services are offered free of charge.

hero-tos.message: By clicking the button below, you agree to our Terms of Use.

feature-faster-2.message: The app blocks annoying ads such as pop-ups, video ads and banners, enabling pages to load faster.

footnote-headline.message: The following rules have and always will apply to everyone, without exception:

footnote-value-users.message: We listen to our users. If an Acceptable Ads proposal is flagged by our community for a legitimate reason, we will remove it from the whitelist.

hero-subheading.message: Download Adblock Plus for Safari and experience a cleaner and faster web:

feature-aa-2.message: Want to block all ads? No problem. Learn how

feature-aa-1.message: Websites need money to stay free. Support them by allowing Acceptable Ads (on by default).

description.message: Download Adblock Plus, a free ad blocker for Safari, and block annoying ads, pop-ups, trackers & more! Fast ad blocker for macOS.

feature-faster-1.message: We’ve designed the Safari ad blocker to be fast and ultra-light on your Mac’s resources.

hero-item-2.message: Stop viruses and malware hidden in ads

hero-item-3.message: Acceptable Ads are allowed by default to support websites (learn more)[1]

app-store-button-label.message: Get Adblock Plus on the App Store

footnote-must-comply.message: Participants cannot pay to avoid the criteria. Every ad must comply.
